name: Robostar
0:
”Alexa, turn on vacuum”
”Alexa, turn off vacuum”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Robostar skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your TESLA Robostar vacuum by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your TESLA Robostar account and discover your devices.
Once you linked TESLA Robostar account, assume the name of your vacuum is “vacuum”, you can say the following:
• "Alexa, turn on vacuum."
• "Alexa, turn off vacuum"
You can change the name of your vacuum in “TESLA Robostar iQ500/600” app. An easy name will help Alexa to recognize your vacuum.
